Description: Focuses on computing theory, programming, software development, artificial intelligence, and computer systems.
Specializes in designing, constructing, and maintaining infrastructure like bridges, roads, buildings, and dams.
Deals with the design, manufacturing, and maintenance of mechanical systems, machines, and engines.
Covers electricity, electronics, electromagnetism, circuit design, and power generation technologies.
Combines chemistry, physics, and biology to develop processes for manufacturing chemicals, fuels, foods, and pharmaceuticals.
